channel.title: One Program File For Client
channel.description:
Ok goes this is hard to explain right ok i try to make this simple as i can:
Ok i want a Windows Batch File (Thats To Run My Client) i want that to be the only file there is wat shall i put in the Edit Button this wat i have so far:
[code]@echo off java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause [/code]
Please Get back to me.. Rep++ To Person who helps me!!

item.title: One Program File For Client
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

rune_sleep:

Rep++ To Person who helps me!!

You cannot distibute reputation.

From what I understand, You would want to put your client files in the folder “Program Files” and then have a shortcut on the desktop. I suggest using Install Creator

Read full topic
